titleInfo.title: Corona-specific Health Literacy in Germany : Second survey of the HLS-COVID-19 trend study. Short Summary Report

mods.abstract: This is the English short summary of the original German Report (https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/record/2950307)

originInfo.publisher: Bielefeld University, Interdisciplinary Centre for Health Literacy Research
